doc.previous: As an allied victory became increasingly apparent non Serb communities opted for the Partisans as providing a more palatable future than the Serbianization policies of the royalist government in the first Yugoslavia By contrast the dynamic in Serbia was influenced by the allies support of the Partisan governmental institutions over that of the royal government citation needed
